name: Awesome RPG
short_description:
Awesome RPG is a simplistic game shell designed around the idea of allowing the community to shape it as they see fit.

All content in the game from items to quests to classes are fully customizable via XML files.

Also, due to the fact that the game is completely open source, the community can modify the game any way they see fit, from adding graphics to changing the game's genre altogether.

Whilst the base game itself will be fairly minimal on content and features, this does not mean I expect the community to do all the work for me, I will still release patches to iron out bugs etc, and I will frequently create mods/content packs of my own.

I am creating this game because I believe that a community should choose how a game is shaped, and I would very much like to see the outcome. I also believe that sometimes, less is more and the fact that almost all features are completely optional adds to that.
